name: electron-template
description: 基于 umijs + dva + electron + typescript +antd 的模板项目

scripts.start: yarn run start:renderer && yarn run start:main
scripts.start:renderer: cross-env APP_ROOT=src/renderer PORT=10000 BROWSER=none umi dev
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && yarn run build:renderer && yarn run build:main:prod
scripts.package:win: yarn run build && rm -rf release && electron-builder build --win --x64
scripts.package:linux: yarn run build && rm -rf release && electron-builder build --linux
scripts.package:mac: yarn run build && rm -rf release && electron-builder build --mac
scripts.release:win: yarn run build && electron-builder build --ia32 --x64 --win -p always
scripts.release:mac: yarn run build && electron-builder build --mac -p always
scripts.release:linux: yarn run build && electron-builder build --linux -p always
scripts.release:linux:arm: yarn run build electron-builder build --linux --armv7l -p always
scripts.release:all: yarn run build && electron-builder build -mwl -p always
scripts.patch: yarn version --patch && git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.minor: yarn version --minor && git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.major: yarn version --major && git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.test:renderer: cross-env APP_ROOT=src/renderer PORT=6008 BROWSER=none umi test
